entry.content:
UX improvements for mobile expense input

entry.title: New release for bewCloud: v1.5.3
entry.content:
UX fixes and improvements for Expenses in mobile.

entry.title: New release for bewCloud: v1.5.4
entry.content:
Brings back Makefile into the container, which was removed by mistake, and is helpful for the first-time setup.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bewcloud/bewcloud/compare/v1.5.3...v1.5.4

entry.title: New release for bewCloud: v1.5.5
entry.content:
Allow customising the title and the help email, or hiding it entirely.

What's Changed

  • Custom Title, Description and Help Email by @DcZipPL in https://github.com/bewcloud/bewcloud/pull/54

New Contributors

  • @DcZipPL made their first contribution in https://github.com/bewcloud/bewcloud/pull/54

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bewcloud/bewcloud/compare/v1.5.4...v1.5.5

entry.title: New release for bewCloud: v1.5.6
entry.content:
Improved expenses UX: Enter on expense description submits it, and auto-complete suggestions start from closest to longest match.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bewcloud/bewcloud/compare/v1.5.5...v1.5.6
